ldf725: Self compassion is the ultimate healer. A sudden loss of a loved one can change your perception of reality. It test your faith, your choices, your will, your self awareness. It pushes you into this web of darkness you cannot breathe. You cry a cry that you have never heard. It comes out of you as pain. Pain in sound waves. In those moments you have to be willing to let it take you. Your pain has to take you where you want it. When it is over you can rise again.
